item.title: Veiled Whisper of Love - A love poem
item.description: ❣️ In Shadows Cast, She holds her breath, Bound to love, She fights with death. In doubts, she dances, lost in fear, Unsure if his love’s truly near. 🖤 With every touch, she seeks a sign, In whispered words, a tangled line. Does he love her? She can’t decode, In toxic webs, their hearts erode. 😰 Yet still she stays, in hope’s embrace, Caught in love’s elusive chase. In shadows deep, her heart entwined,

item.title: UNCHANGING SIGHTS - A POEM
item.description: Made the wrong choice, Hell is the repitition, Hoping for new scenes, but I see same sights. item.title: THE WEIGHT I CARRY - A POEM
item.description: While you claim to care, When I bring my issues to you, I feel like they’re being belittled as minor concerns. Even though you say to “ignore it,” I’m left with a hurt heart… Latest publications 2024.02.28 Veiled Whisper of Love - A love poem 2024.01.26 UNCHANGING SIGHTS - A POEM 2024.01.17 THE WEIGHT I CARRY - A POEM 2024.01.08 REFLECTIONS OF LOVE - A poetic tapestry 2024.01.08 I CAN'T BREATHE - A Poem

item.title: REFLECTIONS OF LOVE - A poetic tapestry
item.description: In the mirror’s gaze, find strength untold, Embrace the flaws, let self-love unfold. A dance with echoes of kindness within, Cherish the soul, let self-love begin. Through trials and triumphs, be your guide, In the heart’s cathedral, let love reside. Each flaw a note in the melody of you, Compose a symphony, authentic and true. Like petals unfolding in morning light, Discover self-love, a radiant sight. No need for judgment, let acceptance bloom,

item.title: I CAN'T BREATHE - A Poem
item.description: In shadows cast by prejudice, a tale unfolds, “I can’t breathe,” the whispered plea, truth be told. A world divided by the hues we wear, Yet, in unity, a remedy lies somewhere. Echoes of injustice linger in the air, As wounds of hatred fester, deep and bare. “I can’t breathe,” a refrain of human pain, Yearning for a day when love shall reign. Skin is but a canvas, painted diverse,
